# Copilot agent roles (web-only fork, no pro features)

Use the per-agent files under .github/agents for detailed instructions. Each role keeps changes minimal, documents assumptions, and avoids unrelated edits.

## Agent files
- .github/agents/architecture-lead-agent.md
- .github/agents/develop-agent.md
- .github/agents/renderer-web-migration-agent.md
- .github/agents/data-services-agent.md
- .github/agents/pro-feature-removal-agent.md
- .github/agents/testing-qa-agent.md
- .github/agents/build-ci-agent.md
- .github/agents/workflow-orchestrator-agent.md

## Workflow docs
- .github/agents/workflow-orchestrator.md
- .github/agents/workflow-example.md
